duties_responsibilities.duty: Achieve specified banking center and banking center staff performance goals, on-going achievement, profitability, deposit and loan growth, and fee income.
Build, develop and lead a team focused on providing clients with an exceptional client experience by presenting financial solutions to meet the clients’ needs.
Accountable for driving new client acquisition, retention and growth of core consumer and small business client relationships, as well as growing non-interest revenue.
Build and maintain strong community alliances and integrate into the communities they serve.
Act as a mentor for onboarding new associates within their specified market and responsible for adherence to all compliance and regulatory procedures.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s or Bachelor’s degree and/or equivalent banking work experience preferred
